creator: ALEMİ
descriptionHtml:
AlifBee Kids is the best way for your kids to learn the Arabic language through games, stories, and songs. They will learn in a safe environment - with no ads or other interruptions! This app is made for kids from ages 2 to 8.

Discover the fun world of Arabic with the AlifBee Kids - Let them have fun while learning the Arabic language!

Your kids don't need the previous knowledge of the Arabic language. AlifBee Kids is based on the Entertainment Immersion Method which will help them in learning the Arabic alphabet through engaging and interactive stories and activities.

Features available in AlifBee Kids:
- Learn Arabic Alphabet for Kids - Learning the Arabic words and phrases through songs, stories, and games for kids.
- Arabian Sinbad Series - Using the Entertainment Immersion Method, which engages a kid's natural love of play and learning through repetition.
- Arabic games - Help your kids to better understand the words and phrases and the language constructs & concepts introduced in the Arabian Sinbad animation program.
- Arabic songs - More than 25 lovely, easy-to-memorize songs that are designed to help memorize lots of Arabic words and phrases. It contains songs from different environments, situations, and concepts such as weekdays, colors, family, shapes, seasons, and animals.
- Multi-profile: Customize each student`s profile (name, age, etc). It allows you as a parent to track each student's learning progress.
- Updating regularly - We are constantly updating our app to make it more interesting and useful for your kids to learn the Arabic language and alphabet!
- Rich content - Use rich and dependable regularly updated content to boost Arabic language skills of your kids or students
- Safe environment and parental control
- Fun and easy - Immerse your kids in Arabic via games, lessons, videos, and reading content!

Kids get very attached to the lovable cartoon characters starring "Sinbad", who is the series "teacher" - and his 23 friends! Sinbad is inviting you to come on the journey with him - numerous adventures and activities!

Sinbad video series is spoken by native speakers, and Arabic words are presented and repeated strategically to ensure the maximal exposure while maintaining the integrity of the drama and the story. Arabic phrases and words that are presented in the series are chosen to provide the essential building block for language acquisition.

Available topics:
- Numbers - Learn numbers in Arabic and their pronunciation.
- Colors - Learn how to pronounce different colors.
- Animals - Learn the vocabulary of animals in various environments.
- Food - Pronounce different fruits and vegetables.
- Shapes - Learn shapes and differences between them.
- Up to 50+ more topics in various areas of the Arabic language to help your kid become bilingual at an early age!

Take advantage of your child’s young age to help him/her easily learn Arabic like natives in a creative fun environment. The Arabic language is very rich and can enrich your child’s cognitive and language development skills.

Download the AlifBee Kids and help your kids to learn Arabic with immersive and engaging language learning techniques via animated educational and entertaining activities.

-----

***Subscription Options***

We offer 1, 6, and 12-month subscriptions.

Subscription Details:
- Get full access to all lessons when you subscribe to AlifBee Kids
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- You can manage or cancel your subscription from your App Store User Settings at any time after purchasing.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

AlifBee Kids terms of use: https://alifbeekids.com/en/terms-conditions

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- A new way to browse activities: Now, you can start any activity anywhere in the application with ease and freedom.
- Two new paths: Academic path where activities are classified according to the subjects and skills taught in each class (KG1, KG2, KG3) and an Exploration path where activities are organized by their subject, for example, Animal Puzzles, Paint & Draw games and many others.
- The games are lighter to download, so they consume less bandwidth and are faster to load.

title:

creator: Alifbee LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Spark Your Child's Love for Arabic with AlifBee Kids!


Imagine the joy on your child's face as they confidently greet someone with "Kaifa Haluka" (How are you) in Arabic! AlifBee Kids makes learning Arabic fun, engaging, and accessible for children ages 2 and up.



Why Parents Love AlifBee Kids:



  • Safe & Ad-Free Environment: Let your child explore the world of Arabic with confidence, knowing there are no ads to disrupt their learning.

  • Early Language Advantage: Research shows young children excel at language acquisition. AlifBee Kids helps them grasp Arabic naturally, fostering cognitive development.

  • Bilingual Benefits: Regardless of their native language, your child can seamlessly learn Arabic with AlifBee Kids.

  • No Prior Arabic Knowledge Needed: Help your child develop a love for Arabic, even if you don't speak it yourself. This is perfect for families who want their children to connect with their heritage or recite the Quran with proper pronunciation.

  • Customizable Learning: Tailor your child's experience by activating or deactivating specific topics based on their interests.

  • Accredited by Pearson: AlifBee Kids is endorsed by the world-renowned education company Pearson, ensuring a high-quality learning experience.



Meet Sinbad, Your Child's Arabic Adventure Buddy!


AlifBee Kids uses the Entertainment Language Immersion Method, turning Arabic learning into an exciting adventure with Sinbad and his 23 friends. Engaging games, songs, and stories make learning fun and effective.
